div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 273 Nea Smyrni, near Athens, c. 1957 Burial: c. 150-130 B.C.? (T) Contents: 3+ AE Athens: 3 New Style (2 as Svoronos pl. 22, 55) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1958, p. 652 (The second hd. referred to contained Athenian Imperial coins)
